What is WordPress?

WordPress is a content management system (CMS) used to make and manage websites.

Why WordPress?

One in every five websites on the internet is powered by WordPress, which means there is a wealth of information available to help you troubleshoot any issues you may encounter.

What is a WordPress Plugin?

WordPress plugins are additional tools that extend the capability of your website with just a few clicks. They can help you add features like contact forms, search engine optimization, e-shop solutions, security enhancements, and more. With thousands of plugins available, you can easily customize your site to meet your specific needs and improve performance.
